---
title-block-style: none
sidebar: false
bread-crumbs: false
---

::: {.column-screen}

<script type="module" src="https://unpkg.com/rapidoc/dist/rapidoc-min.js"></script>

<rapi-doc 
    spec-url="https://api.dev.vm.validmind.ai/vm/api/v1/swagger.json"
    show-header="false"
    theme="light"
    load-fonts="true"
    regular-font="Inter"
    mono-font="'Consolas' monospace"
    font-size="largest"
    primary-color="#196972"
    bg-color="#ffffff"
    nav-bg-color="#ffffff" 
    nav-text-color="#585F60" 
    nav-hover-bg-color="#ffffff" 
    nav-hover-text-color="#de257e"
    nav-accent-color="#de257e" 
    nav-accent-text-color="#de257e"
    show-method-in-nav-bar="as-plain-text"
    show-components="false"
    use-path-in-nav-bar="true"
    allow-authentication="true"
    allow-server-selection="false"
    persist-auth="true"
    allow-try="true"
    show-curl-before-try="true"
    allow-search="true"
    allow-advanced-search="true"
    fill-request-fields-with-example="true">
</rapi-doc>

:::
